title: 512: Dr. Michael Ruscio on Gut Health
description: Sal, Adam & Justin interview Dr. Michael Ruscio a doctor, researcher, author, and health enthusiast. He is a gut health specialist and in this episode he shares the latest research on maximizing the health of your microbiome. You can find Dr. Ruscio, Get our newest program, Kettlebells 4 Aesthetics (KB4A), which provides full expert workout programming to sculpt and shape your body using kettlebells.
